news_header: Denmark supports Ukraine with a significant military fund while enhancing its own defense capabilities.
news_original_title: Tanska aikoo yli kaksinkertaistaa puolustusbudjettinsa – mistä on kysymys?
news_text: Denmark is setting an example by supporting Ukraine through a proposed SEK 50 billion fund for military purchases, while also enhancing its own defense capabilities. The Danish government aims to improve its military readiness and has already supplied significant military equipment to Ukraine, including artillery and F-16 fighters. Experts believe some funds will also be allocated to bolster Denmark's defense amidst a deteriorating security situation.
